title: [HOLD for payment 2024-11-29] [$150] Switch to classic in the same tab
issue_repo_steps:
Problem: When a user switches to classic, we open www.expensify.com in a new tab. It isn't intuitive to them to close that tab on web. As a result they switch over and over again. Solution: When a user switches to Classic, open [www.expensify.com](http://www.expensify.com/) in the same tab, rather than a new tab
